name: Mimiran
overview:
Create and close sales proposals faster online with Mimiran.

Mimiran helps small businesses increase sales by automating the proposal process. You can create proposals quickly with compelling templates, including accurate quotes, product descriptions, customer information, and legal terms. Creating proposals can go from days to minutes.

When you send your prospect a proposal, they get a simple link, not a big attachment. And you get a notification when they are viewing your proposal. No more guessing if your prospect has read your proposal, and you know when to call to have a meaningful discussion. You and your prospect can comment on the proposal, and you can edit until you have just what your prospect needs. The prospect can sign online or download a PDF.
